last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Having moved on to different places in life, the KCU colleagues reunite at a wedding. Sang-su runs into Su-yeong in Seoul after much time apart.

name: The Interest of Love
overview: Four men and women working at the same bank get entangled in a complicated romance as they discover how far they’re willing to go for love.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Four men and women working at the same bank get entangled in a complicated romance as they discover how far they're willing to go for love.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A mix-up at the bank forces Ha Sang-su and Ahn Su-yeong to go on a trip together. When they return, he musters up the courage to ask her a question.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Sang-su is left reeling after his tense conversation with Su-yeong. Meanwhile, a new face joins the bank and quickly becomes friendly with Sang-su.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Jeong Jong-hyeon attempts to get closer to Su-yeong, who is grappling with her past. Park Mi-gyeong and Sang-su team up on a work project.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Mi-gyeong reveals her true feelings to Su-yeong while continuing to maintain their friendship. Su-yeong later receives disappointing news at work.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Su-yeong stands up for herself at work — risking blowback. After being embarrassed in front of Sang-su, Mi-gyeong shares her vulnerabilities with him.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Sang-su and Su-yeong get the chance to open up about their feelings. Mi-gyeong and Sang-su's mothers form an unlikely friendship.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Su-yeong tries to get answers out of Jong-hyeon after his sudden change of heart. Sang-su and Mi-gyeong go public with their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Jong-hyeon and Su-yeong attempt to adjust to their new — and awkward — living situation. Mi-gyeong's mother tries to track down her daughter's new beau.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Mi-gyeong begins to suspect Sang-su's true feelings about Su-yeong. Meanwhile, Su-yeong struggles to manage Jong-hyeon's growing insecurities.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Amid increasing suspicions about Sang-su, Mi-gyeong's anxiety starts to get the better of her. Su-yeong witnesses a scary accident involving her mother.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: After their momentous night at the ice rink, Sang-su and Su-yeong navigate their complex road ahead. Mi-gyeong avoids Sang-su's every attempt to talk.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Mi-gyeong does everything in her power to deny the reality of Sang-su's decision. Confronted with conflicting emotions, Su-yeong reaches a crossroads.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Jong-hyun causes a scene at work after confronting Soo-young about her shocking act. Sang-soo attempts to make sense of Soo-young's behavior.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Steadfast in his feelings, Sang-su tends to Su-yeong during her time of need. After delaying the inevitable, Mi-gyeong makes a final decision.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Sang-su searches for answers after Su-yeong's sudden disappearance. Su-yeong learns the truth about her parents — and realizes her own misunderstanding.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Having moved on to different places in life, the KCU colleagues reunite at a wedding. Sang-su runs into Su-yeong in Seoul after much time apart.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Four men and women working at the same bank get entangled in a complicated romance as they discover how far they're willing to go for love.
